sentences.sContent: I saw him grovelling in the road for his hat.
sentences.sCn: 我看到他趴在路上找帽子。

words.tran: 奴颜婢膝的；卑下的；卑躬屈节的
（在卑屈、恐惧等时）匍匐；卑躬屈膝（grovel的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: to praise someone a lot or behave with a lot of respect towards them because you think that they are important and will be able to help you in some way – used to show disapproval
